thread.title: Daniel Craig: No Decision on Whether He'll Be Back as Bond
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig: No Decision on Whether He'll Be Back as Bond

title: Daniel Craig: No Decision on Whether He'll Be Back as Bond
text:
Daniel Craig: No Decision on Whether He'll Be Back as Bond Posted yesterday at 2:00am 
Sony / Columbia (LONDON) -- Daniel Craig seems to have left the door at least slightly open for another turn as James Bond. 
When asked by the BBC if he's made a decision regarding whether he'll play 007 again, following the release of the upcoming film Spectre , the British actor replied, "No -- this is what's going on at the moment. I'm enjoying this." 
That's a different take from the one Craig gave to Time Out London earlier this month, when he declared, "I’d rather break this glass and slash my wrists....All I want to do is move on." 
Craig now tells the BBC, "I'm quite straightforward and I say things when I feel it and then I change my mind. I'm just like everybody else. People latch onto things. There's not a lot I can do about that." 
Craig has played Bond in four movies, including Spectre , which opens November 6.
